Articles.Content:
Well, we\'ve had a great turn out with our most recent recruitment drive, so give a big 'Grats!' to everyone listed below..

Foamy - EU Team Mod

Deadshot462 - US Team Mod

Rich - EU Team Mod

Sal_Vager - EU Team Mod

DYJ - EU Team Mod
Congrats! Sad I couldent enter (under aged) but I hope you enjoy your newfound power!
Great work everybody, Many congrats. There sure is some talent on the team now. Kind of like the credits of an A-list movie.
Congratulations! I can\'t wait to see what this new addition of moderators will do.

Congratulations!

Please don\'t delete my post this time. This is a valid post. Why should I say something that has already been told? I\'m just a bit too lazy but now I need to write this whole text wall to make sure my post don\'t get deleted.

Please don\'t delete my post this time. This is a valid post. Why should I say something that has already been told? I\'m just a bit too lazy but now I need to write this whole text wall to make sure my post don\'t get deleted. What a suck rule.

You don\'t have to like the rules, you only have to follow them. If you disagree so vehemently with the rules, you are free to leave this community any time you wish.

-DR

As another note, don\'t use small text to hide things. It\'s annoying. Grats again to all those selected.
Thanks, I am grateful for the opportunity to assist with the smooth running of the KSP project.

We\'re not getting into the age debate again, period. The next person to bring it up will have their posting status revoked for 7-days. This is a thread meant to congratulate the new members of the team, stay on topic. I hate to be this heavy handed, but I\'m left with no choice.

Back on topic, glad to have you aboard Rich.

Currently trying to get settled in, and figure out what all the buttons does without banning anyone.

Team EU will hopefully be fully operational and ready to help out in a few days to complete the round the clock coverage.
Glad to have some EU mods aboard! :cheers: Congratulations to the lot of you.
Welcome aboard! Also, I\'m pretty sure there\'s a wiki for SMF to help you figure out what the buttons do.

A pleasant surprise for this afternoon.

I\'m looking forward to tonight when I get a chance to get up to speed on everything.
Congratulations all! The more mods the better!
Cool news to read, hope to help the community out with this great team!
